item.title: Defcon-2021-Segnalooo
item.description: Excute execveat(0, "/bin/sh", 0, 0, 0) after bypass seccomp filter. Binary Set Signal Handler on Signum 5 ( SIGTRAP ) Allocate Memory twice ( addr1 : 0x10XXXXXXXXXX, addr2 : 0x5XXXXXXXXXXX ) Munmap all Memory except addr1, addr2 Call Signal Handler with int3 After Signal Handler, IP returns to our Shellcode. => There is two Problems. ( Seccomp filter, ud2 instruction ) Seccomp Filter line CODE JT JF K ================================= 0000: 0x20 0x00 0x00 0x00000004 A = arch 0001: 0x15 0x00 0x0a 0xc000003e if (A !
